external.gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi

Interface ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GWRemotable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ABContactSearchSpec
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface ABContactSearchSpecWithoutPaging
extends GWRemotable
    Specifies various parameters to control search. Doesn't not include parameters related to paging and sorting. Pebbles handles that stuff for the UI separately.

      • isWideSearch

        boolean isWideSearch()
        Deprecated. 
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABCompany, com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPerson and com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPlace instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • setWideSearch

        void setWideSearch(boolean value)
        Deprecated. 
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABCompany, com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPerson and com.guidewire.ab.domain.addressbook.ABPlace instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.
